channel.title: Muted, Banned, or anything in between
channel.description:
Hello all,
If you have been muted, banned, and anything else in between with offenses on your rune scape account add it here with a picture or some evidence to it.
Well today I was muted for 3 days :): offensive language :P [code] ME : I am thinking I might save my money so I can get 99 fishing ************ : how did u tesse him? ME : 34 ME : What is your level in Fishing? ME : My Fishing level is 75. ME : What is your level in Mining? ME : My Mining level is 70. ME : :) ME : What is your level in Strength? ME : My Strength level is 70. ME : Lol :P ME : What is your level in Runecrafting? ME : My Runecrafting level is 64. ME : What is your level in Cooking? ME : My Cooking level is 70. ME : English noob ************ : My Attack level is 51. ME : No speek fail ME : L2English ME : Ewww ME : I am not 'gay ME : >.> ME : Daser gtfo if your not going to speek English ME : This is American not American't ME : God I smell botters ME : ass ME : you can say ass ME : Dumb ass ME : Fail ME : ass whipe ME : \thread ME : [clan] <3 ME : Omg ME : all botters leave this world now ME : Like gtfo ME : ? ME : So ME : I can be an ass all I want noob ************ : lol ME : You're just mad you don't have skills like me ME : No you fail like your mom last night ME : ooooooooh he said a mom joke I KNOW! ME : To bad your only in 5th grade huh? ME : Fail ME : It is 5th ************ : i am going to collage ME : Don't like dumb ass ME : Fail ************ : noobs ME : Your the noob here ME : With your 'gay pruple gloves ************ : i am level 66 ur 63 haha noob ME : And? ME : I have a rune one in my bank ME : 35 wc ME : Need 41 to use rune dumb ass ME : My Woodcutting level is 35. ME : Eh I just started today ME : Didn't buy it ME : I can show you my cash if you want? ************ : I like your skillcape. ME : Its decent for a 3 month old account ME : How you doing money? ME : skill wise or merching ME : Nice ME : Merching is fail ME : Why str t? ME : I see ME : loveforesmoch gtfo nigro ME : Nice ME : Nice ME : I just started wc and fm today :\ ************ : stfu and gtfu ME : 30 firemaking ME : ty ME : Nice ME : I am not a member so I have to deal with willow ME : maple is member last time I checked ME : :s ME : Oh ME : I didn't know that before ME : I wish I did :P ************ : 99 ME : I would buy the 99 firemaking then :P ME : I know ME : Botters ME : willows are the fastest way f2p for 99 wc ME : So people bot 99 wc and then sell the account ME : some* ************ : i need level 60 so i can cut yew ME : Yews are good for money ME : 60-99 with yews can catch you about 30+m ME : I was level 80 with 99 wc ME : Oh ME : :P ME : I will say good luck to you guys with yews :P ME : People bot the hell out of those to ME : :P ME : I hate people who report when you don't talk to them ME : It makes me mad ME : \No [/code]
I was just saying some random crap. :)

item.title: Muted, Banned, or anything in between
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

the elve age:

I said mods can’t do anything, and a jmod was in the CC. And he banned me.

Owned.

Read full topic

item.title: Muted, Banned, or anything in between
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]I got perm muted for spamming website addresses using the ‘hidden space’ glitch.
(alt + 0151 for desktop computers)

It’s a hyphen, but was never added to the RuneScape font.
So, it just did a character, but took up no space in the chat.

(They have it fixed now on RuneScape, but their other sites do not. Ex. FunOrb)[/quote]
I also used alt 0151, and I made everything I typed all in caps.

Read full topic

@marcbob wrote:

I have a couple 120+ accounts banned because of botting. Would have sold them either way so idc tbh. Otherwise ive been muted a couple times on the accounts i use now but not temp or permed yet on the 10+ accounts

Read full topic

item.title: Muted, Banned, or anything in between
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

My first account got a 7 day ban for macroing.

First account; 3 24 hour mutes, 1 7 day mute, 1 7 day ban, and a perm ban
Second account; 1 perm ban
Third account; 1 perm ban
Fourth account; 1 perm ban
Fifth account; 1 24 hour mute, 1 30 day mute, 1 perm ban
Sixth account; 1 perm ban
Seventh account; 1 24 hour mute, 1 perm ban
Maybe eighth account; 1 3 day mute so far.

Read full topic

item.title: Muted, Banned, or anything in between
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Me : come on Me : im out of run Me : ok Me : after we kill gaint ok Me : wait Me : after we kill gaint ok Me : now be my freind Me : im *** Me : now kill gaint Me : then kill gaint Me : f Me : u Me : k Me : you Me : bug off Me : last time ok ************ : grrrrr ************ : i just like playing the game... ************ : well most people would know a bow is faster.. ************ : hard to beat ************ : so why do you ask why am slow? ************ : if you know Me : wait ************ : state the obvious ************ : soz jim Me : rojhat listen Me : hit it then hide at tghe corner Me : copy him Me : nerd Me : bow man Me : u u r a noob Me : motha Me : faker Me : ]***e Me : ur mum a sl Me : ut Me : f Me : u Me : k Me : you Me : ***** header
4 years ago or something, i was helping some kid from my school, guess what? some fuckhead reported.

Read full topic

item.title: Muted, Banned, or anything in between
item.dc:creator: @_ZeroScape `ZeroScape
item.description:
@_ZeroScape wrote:

I’ve reached all my botting goals till now

  • 99 Woodcutting
  • 99 Firemaking

Botted like 20 hours a day, and both accounts were not banned before the 99 firemaking account got banned 13 days a week ago because I was having fun. Lol.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

They banned my skiller right when I got 97 firemaking. Thing is that I stopped botting for a whole month and got 97 firemaking by myself.

I did bot woodcutting though so that’s why I got banned.

Read full topic
